2. Tramayne Hobbs

Tramayne Hobbs
==============

Tramayne Hobbs, Council Member, Place 4
[Email Tramayne Hobbs](mailto:tramayne.hobbs@glennheightstx.gov)

(972) 223-1690, ext. 194

Tramayne Hobbs is a dedicated Glenn Heights resident committed to transparency, accountability, and responsible growth. With a background in financial operations and technology-driven improvement, he brings a practical, solutions-focused approach to city governance. Tramayne previously served on his HOA board and remains active in community initiatives to improve safety and quality of life. He is focused on strengthening economic development, expanding essential services, and ensuring every resident has a clear voice in shaping the future of Glenn Heights.
